narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. This is a 2nd Prelicense Inspection for a Class B license.  The 
inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
 
The licensing fee must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. No Class B activities 
may be conducted until a valid USDA Class B license is obtained. 
 
End Section
